name: Spinnerbait
description: Spinnerbaits are flash-heavy lures that provoke aggressive strikes through vibration and visual motion.
purpose: Ideal for targeting reactionary species near submerged structures or murky water.
pros: Great for covering large areas quickly
Effective in murky or stained water
Attracts predatory instincts via flash and vibration
cons: Can be ineffective in clear, calm water
techniques: Use steady retrieve along weed lines
Burn and pause to trigger strikes
Skim just above submerged logs or grass beds
whisper: The spinnerbait dances with chaos — learn to move just fast enough to be seen, and wild enough to be chased.
